MultiInvokerRollupInvalidCalldataError().details: reverts when calldata has an issue. causes: length of bytes in a uint > || cache index empty

initialize().details: Must be called atomically as part of the upgradeable proxy deployment to      avoid front-running

params.invocations: The list of invocations to execute in order

addressCache.details: array of all stored addresses (users, products, vaults, etc) for calldata packing

addressLookup.details: index lookup of above array for constructing calldata

devdoc.title: A calldata-optimized implementation of the Perennial MultiInvoker

invoke((uint8,bytes)[]).notice: Executes a list of invocations in order

userdoc.notice: Retains same functionality and `invoke` entry point from inherited MultiInvoker
